author: Daniel Cooper
title: The Morning After: Is the M3 iMac worth it?
description:
Unlike many of my peers, I prefer desktops to laptops, so I’m always excited when a new iMac rolls off the production line. I’ve had my eye on one for a while, especially now it’s packing an M3 chip
 with all the power that promises. Sadly for me and other d…
